article: Look! This is my room. It has a big window. My bed is near the window . Next to the bed there is a desk. .My books are on the desk. My pens, rulers and other _ things are in my school bag. The bag is _ the door. In the morning, I clean my room and put everything in good order. Can you see the cat under the chair? _ my cat Mimi. I have a bird Polly, but you can't see it in this room. It's a Chinese cat. It's in my _ . The cat and the bird can't live in the same room, you know.
